LanguageData.EshinFaction.label: Skaven traders
LanguageData.EshinFaction.description: Free standing clans of traders. These skaven tend to keep a neutral attitude compared to their kin in the Under-Empire.
LanguageData.SkavenPlayerFaction.label: skaven colony
LanguageData.UnderEmpireFaction.label: Skaven empire
LanguageData.UnderEmpireFaction.description: The united front of the Under-empire. Warlord clans under the great clans lead these straggling ratmen.
